title: SVM: Maximum Margin Separating Hyperplane
description: In this lab, we will use scikit-learn to create a two-class separable dataset and plot the maximum margin separating hyperplane using a Support Vector Machine (SVM) classifier with a linear kernel. SVM is a powerful classification algorithm that finds the best boundary or hyperplane that separates the data into different classes while maximizing the margin between the classes.

meta.title: Mastering the Maximum Margin Separating Hyperplane with SVM
meta.description: Explore the power of Support Vector Machines (SVM) in creating a two-class separable dataset and plotting the maximum margin separating hyperplane.
meta.keywords: machine learning, classification, separating hyperplane, scikit-learn, maximum margin, svm, scikit-learn playground
